subject: Simson pro pedals
description_text:
Hello,

I want to use the new software with my pro pedals. If i buy the new upgraded control box will they be recognized as plus X? So i can use the brake force measure for calibrating?  Or is not posible

conversations.body_text: Hi fabian botero,  Yes, that’s fine — you just need to upgrade to the PlusX controller.

In the ali express it says you wont ship to colombia. Can someone update that? I bought the pedals directly from ali express

________________________________

The address is:

Fabian Botero
Cra 43 # 84b 51
Barranquilla, Atlantico
Colombia, 080020

________________________________
Hello, you may make your purchase via this link.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498
Hi fabian botero,  We have replied to you on the AliExpress platform. You can check the message and place an order in the store link.

Can you add a link for a one way damper for the throttle?? So i can add it to the cart too??  Im going to buy 2 plus x control box and 1 one way damper

________________________________

Can you please add it to ali express to finish the purchase

________________________________
Hello, you can contact the seller on the AliExpress platform to require that they list the item.

Please remind them to send the link for the one way throttle damper and to update the shipping for the address, they sent me a link for a 2 way damper and not even shippable  lol

 Fabian Botero
Cra 43 # 84b 51
Barranquilla, Atlantico
Colombia, 080020

________________________________
